title: 2 Aggressive NHL Teams Take To The Ice In Game 1 Of Stanley Cup Finals
teaser: Pro hockey's Stanley Cup Finals kick off Wednesday night. David Greene talks to Greg Wyshynski, editor of Yahoo's Puck Daddy blog, for a preview of the Chicago Blackhawks and the Tampa Bay Lightning.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
